name: Stupid Pong
description:
We all know Pong, right? Well, what if you took Pong and made it stupid?

Features: -Full 8-direction movement -The ability to orient the paddle however you like -Wiggly numbers -Pain Controls: -R to reset ball -Escape Key to pause -C to close the game -X to reset the game Player 1: -WASD for movement -SHIFT to rotate paddle -Q to rotate paddle back to original state Player 2: -Directional arrows for movement -CTRL to rotate paddle -ENTER to rotate paddle back to original state

Sound effects by Kenney

Made in Godot
